source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000010_CID<tab>...In summary, the isle owes its lofty position to the industry of the Allagans. And we can be all but certain that the archbishop and his cronies are enjoying the view from its top.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000010_CID<tab>……つまり「魔大陸」とは、
古代アラグ文明が築いた人工浮遊大陸らしいってことだ。
教皇たちも、そこに向かったとみて間違いないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000020_AYMERIC<tab>I see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000020_AYMERIC<tab>なるほど、状況は理解した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000030_CID<tab>If we are to join them, we will first need to pass through the isle's aetheric barrier─which is, alas, more powerful than most. Powerful enough to make a mess of a perfectly good airship, at any rate...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000030_CID<tab>問題は「魔大陸」を覆う高密度のエーテル帯だ。
無理に接近しようものなら、真っ逆さまだぜ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000040_CID<tab>As far as I can gather, the barrier mechanism draws aether from the surrounding environment, and polarizes its elemental aspect to produce what is, in effect, a wall of lightning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000040_CID<tab>詳しい仕組みはわからんが、
恐らくは、周辺のエーテルを雷属性に変換し、
防御フィールドに転用しているんだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>It seems plain that without the Vanu's key, any attempt to reach the isle will end in failure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>……例の「鍵」がなければ、安全には近づけないということか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000060_CID<tab>Alas, the key was careless enough to leave without us, and I don't think the Vanu keep a spare.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000060_CID<tab>まぁ、持ち去られちまったモンのことを、
あれこれ考えても仕方がないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000070_AYMERIC<tab>Master Garlond─based on your experience, is there no other way that we might breach the barrier?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000070_AYMERIC<tab>シド殿、機工師としての知識を見込んで問いたい……
強行突破の可能性は、いかほどだろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000080_CID<tab>Well, in the past, we've beaten similar barriers by nullifying them with elemental converters.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000080_CID<tab>そうだな……。
真っ先に思いつくのは、これまで何度かやったことがある、
「属性変換機構」で雷属性を変換し、打ち消すって方法だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000090_CID<tab>But the one we're up against this time dwarfs aught we've encountered before. The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> simply isn't large enough to bear the requisite amount of crystals.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000090_CID<tab>しかし、今回はあまりにも規模がデカい。
「エンタープライズ」の積載量では……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000100_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am reminded of the quantity needed to nullify Leviathan's command of the sea... A veritable mountain of crystals that could only be borne by lashing two galleons together to form a “twin vessel” scarcely able to propel itself, much less fly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000100_ALPHINAUD<tab>確かに、対「リヴァイアサン」で用いられた双胴船は、
大型船二隻をつなぎ合わせた巨大なものだった。
自力航行すらできないほどのね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000110_CID<tab>That said, we're not without options. If it isn't feasible to nullify the barrier, we might try <var 1A 02 /var>piercing<var 1A 01 /var> it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000110_CID<tab>手がないわけじゃない。
打ち消すのが無理なら、一点突破だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000120_AYMERIC<tab>How?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000120_AYMERIC<tab>……それは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000130_CID<tab>We create a ram of condensed aether and mount it on my ship. There's just one problem─I don't have the faintest idea how to build one. It's going to take a true authority in the field, I reckon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000130_CID<tab>高密度のエーテルの刃を作り、向こうのフィールドを切り裂く。
エーテルで作られた衝角……いわば「エーテルラム」だ。
だが、これにはエーテル学の知識が必要不可欠になる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Would that the Archons were still with us...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000140_ALPHINAUD<tab>エーテル学の専門家か。
賢人の皆がいてくれればな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000150_EDMONT<tab>But yesterday evening, I chanced to find Mistress Tataru in unusually high spirits. Assuming I understood her excited ramblings correctly, she has acquired a clue pointing to the whereabouts of one such individual.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000150_EDMONT<tab>賢人と言えば、昨晩、タタル嬢が大騒ぎをしておったぞ。
何でも、尋ね人の手がかりが掴めたとかで……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>An Archon!? Truly!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>なんですって……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000170_CID<tab>Hah, fortune favors the righteous, eh? Well then, let's not waste any time. While you go and look for our missing friend, I'll work on modifying the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>. Her hull will need reinforcing to bear the punishment, not to mention a mount for the ram.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000170_CID<tab>へへっ、諦めなきゃ運は回ってくるぜ。
お前たちは賢人探しの方を頼む。
俺たちは、「エンタープライズ」の改修を進めておこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000180_CID<tab>Just you wait, my pretty─by the time I'm finished, you'll be an airship reborn!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_000180_CID<tab>船体の強度を増やすのも当然だが、
「エーテルラム」の搭載に備えて、拡張も必要だからな。
……待ってろよ相棒、見違えるようにしてやるぜ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100010_KANESENNA<tab>In requesting the elementals' assistance to find Y'shtola, you must needs be aware of one difficulty─a difficulty born of the fundamental difference between man and elemental.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100010_KANESENNA<tab>森の大精霊に、ヤ・シュトラさんの行方を問うとして、
ひとつ問題があります。
……それは、精霊と人の存在の違いに由来するもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100020_ALPHINAUD<tab>That being...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100020_ALPHINAUD<tab>存在の違いとは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100030_KANESENNA<tab>In perceiving the world around him, man relies upon senses such as sight and sound. For the sake of convenience, he gives names to such things as are near or dear to him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100030_KANESENNA<tab>私たち人が他者を認識するとき、
姿や声で違いを知り、名を付けることで区別します。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100040_KANESENNA<tab>Being formed of pure aether, however, such concepts are foreign to the elementals. Instead, they perceive by observing the ebb and flow of the energies of life.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100040_KANESENNA<tab>ですが、純粋なエーテル体ともいうべき精霊は、
エーテルの輝きや揺らぎを認識するのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100050_KANESENNA<tab>So profound a division cannot be bridged with simple discourse. The elementals' voices stir not the air, and thus reach not our ears, while our words are but wind to them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100050_KANESENNA<tab>彼らの声が、人の耳に届かないのも、
空気の揺らめきである音に頼らぬゆえのこと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100060_KANESENNA<tab>Though we seers can commune with them through feelings, naught that we can impart will serve to aid them in identifying Y'shtola. Nay, they must needs be presented with aether which is akin to hers. If you could but find a family member...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100060_KANESENNA<tab>そのため、いかに言葉を尽くしても、
精霊たちがヤ・シュトラさんを認識するのは難儀でしょう。
彼女に良く似たエーテルを知れると良いのですが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100070_TATARU<tab>Oh, I know just the person!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100070_TATARU<tab>それなら、心あたりがあるでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100080_TATARU<tab>Y'shtola has a sister who came to live in Gridania. She told me about her once.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100080_TATARU<tab>前にヤ・シュトラさんから、
妹さんがグリダニアに滞在してるって、
聞いたことがあるでっす。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100090_KANESENNA<tab>That is most fortunate indeed! Pray seek this sister out, then, and bring her to Everschade.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100090_KANESENNA<tab>まぁ、それは素晴らしい！
では、妹さんを探し出し、
エバーシェイドまで連れてきていただけますか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100100_KANESENNA<tab>There, we shall petition the great ones' aid in finding your lost companion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_100100_KANESENNA<tab>かの地で大精霊に語りかけ、
ヤ・シュトラさんを探し出してもらいましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200010_KANESENNA<tab>Let us begin.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200010_KANESENNA<tab>……それでは、始めましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200020_KANESENNA<tab>Raya-O, A-Ruhn─if you would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200020_KANESENNA<tab>ラヤ・オ、ア・ルン……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200030_KANESENNA<tab>Hearken to me, O great ones. Pray give yourselves to the Lifestream, a drifting soul to find.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200030_KANESENNA<tab>黒衣森に棲まう大精霊よ……。
森をたゆたう地脈の流れに身を任せ、
今も彷徨う魂を探し出したまえ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200040_TATARU<tab>Please, Y'shtola... Please come back to us...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200040_TATARU<tab>ヤ・シュトラさん……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200050_KANESENNA<tab>There!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200050_KANESENNA<tab>見つけた……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200060_KANESENNA<tab>Now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200060_KANESENNA<tab>地脈を開きます！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200070_KANESENNA<tab>A room has been readied at the Roost. Pray bear her thither at once.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200070_KANESENNA<tab>カーラインカフェの宿に、部屋を用意させてあります。
急ぎ、ヤ・シュトラさんをそちらへ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200080_KANESENNA<tab>All that remains is to pray, my friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_200080_KANESENNA<tab>あとは、大いなる精霊たちの加護に、祈りましょう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300010_TATARU<tab>Y'shtola! I'm so glad you're back!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300010_TATARU<tab>ヤ・シュトラさん！
よかった、意識が戻ったでっすね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300020_YSHTOLA<tab>Tataru...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300020_YSHTOLA<tab>タタル……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300030_TATARU<tab>Weahhh! Weahhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300030_TATARU<tab>うええん、うええん……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300040_YSHTOLA<tab>You are safe... Thank the Twelve.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300040_YSHTOLA<tab>あなた……よく無事で……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300050_YSHTOLA<tab>Something has changed about you, Alphinaud. Or mayhap the change is with me? I seem to sense the aether around me more keenly than before.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300050_YSHTOLA<tab>アルフィノ様、少し雰囲気が変わったのかしら？
フフ……変ね、今まで以上に人のエーテルを強く感じられるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300060_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am pleased to see you well again. Do you feel strong enough to talk?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300060_ALPHINAUD<tab>もう具合は大丈夫なのかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300070_YSHTOLA<tab>Worry not. I am well enough.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300070_YSHTOLA<tab>ありがとう、ミトラ。
また後で……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tell us, then─what befell you after you fled the feast? We were told that there had been a tunnel collapse.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300080_ALPHINAUD<tab>先の「戦勝祝賀会」のあと、何があったんだい。
脱出路は瓦礫の山だったというが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300090_YSHTOLA<tab>That was my doing. I brought the tunnel down that you and Minfilia might escape.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300090_YSHTOLA<tab>あなたとミンフィリアを逃がすため、
追手の足止めに、地下水道の天井を崩落させたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300100_YSHTOLA<tab>At the last moment, I invoked a teleportation magick in hopes of spiriting Thancred away, at least. Needless to say, it did not go quite as planned, and I found myself adrift in the Lifestream.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300100_YSHTOLA<tab>その際、せめて一緒にいたサンクレッドだけでも助けようと、
「エンシェント・テレポ」を発動したのだけれど……
地脈を彷徨うことになってしまったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300110_YSHTOLA<tab>The others─where are they? Did they not escape?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300110_YSHTOLA<tab>そういえば、ミンフィリアは……？
みんなはどこなの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300120_ALPHINAUD<tab>They remain unaccounted for. You are the only one we have been able to find.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300120_ALPHINAUD<tab>残念ながら、君以外は消息を絶ったままだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300130_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am truly sorry. It was the Crystal Braves who pursued you that day─my hubris that led to our undoing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300130_ALPHINAUD<tab>君たちを追っていたのは、クリスタルブレイブだったそうだね。
すまない、全ては私の驕りが招いた結果だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300140_YSHTOLA<tab>No apologies are necessary, Alphinaud─you are not to blame for what occurred. Know that were our comrades here, they would commend you for keeping the light of hope alive.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300140_YSHTOLA<tab>いいえ、そんなことないわ。
暁の灯を消さずにいてくれてありがとう、アルフィノ様。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300150_TATARU<tab>Don't...don't worry! The others are alive and well, I'm sure of it! We just need to find them!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300150_TATARU<tab>ほかのみんなも、きっと生きてるでっす！
受付の名にかけて、私が見つけ出してみせるでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed, Tataru. Let us find our friends and rebuild the Scions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300160_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうだね、タタル。
そして、「暁」を立て直そう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300170_YSHTOLA<tab>Ha! There is the Alphinaud I remember─and I feel much the better for his return! 'Tis time I arose!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300170_YSHTOLA<tab>フフ……元気な姿を見て安心したわ。
なら、私もはりきらないとね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300180_TATARU<tab>That reminds me! I have a change of clothes for you! I don't like to boast, but I made them myself. I learned how to weave while we were in Ishgard, you see.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300180_TATARU<tab>ヤ・シュトラさん、お着替えはこちらでっす。
実はイシュガルドで、裁縫の修行をして作っていたのでっす！
再会に備えて、新しい衣装を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300190_YSHTOLA<tab>Tataru has apprised me of all that took place in the aftermath of the assassination plot. It would seem I have been away for some while.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300190_YSHTOLA<tab>タタルから話を聞いたわ。
ナナモ陛下の暗殺計画に、イシュガルドの動乱……
予想以上に、時間が経過していたのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yes, much and more happened during your absence. At present, we seek to follow the archbishop to Azys Lla.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300200_ALPHINAUD<tab>我々の目下の目的は、
「魔大陸」に向かったイシュガルド教皇を追うことだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300210_YSHTOLA<tab>And you want for some manner of aetheric ram to pierce the floating isle's protective barrier.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300210_YSHTOLA<tab>それには、「魔大陸」を守る防御フィールドを突破するための、
飛空艇に取り付けるエーテルの衝角……
「エーテルラム」が必要なのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300220_ALPHINAUD<tab>We do. Might you be able to furnish us with one?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300220_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうなんだ。
君のエーテル学の知識で、どうにかならない物だろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300230_YSHTOLA<tab>A means to prise open a hole in an Allagan barrier─and one large enough to admit an airship, no less... Hm... Nay. I lack the knowledge to devise such a weapon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300230_YSHTOLA<tab>アラグが誇る防御フィールドを貫き、
飛空艇が通過できるほどの大穴を穿つとなると、
一筋縄ではいかないわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300240_YSHTOLA<tab>...But I know of one who could.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300240_YSHTOLA<tab>でも、彼女なら……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300250_YSHTOLA<tab>A leading figure in the field of aetheric research, and one of the finest scholars ever to grace Sharlayan─Matoya, my former master.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_300250_YSHTOLA<tab>シャーレアンが誇るエーテル学の権威……
「マトーヤ」老の知恵を借りれば、あるいは。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_400010_EDMONT<tab>To the Thaliak River, whereto the melted snows of Abalathia's Spine
eventually find their way by means of a thousand silver streams...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_400010_EDMONT<tab>アバラシア山脈から流れ出た雪解け水は
無数の小川となって降り やがて集まりサリャク河となる

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_400020_EDMONT<tab>Whose waters have long nourished the Dravanian hinterlands, and so provided
for a settlement of learned souls from across the northern seas...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_400020_EDMONT<tab>この大河の恵みにより 低地ドラヴァニアは
豊かな自然に恵まれ 長らくひとつの都市を養ってきた

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_400030_EDMONT<tab>To the city of Sharlayan, that great seat of knowledge,
now abandoned by her keepers, they came.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_400030_EDMONT<tab>学術都市「シャーレアン」――
今や住民が北洋に去り 廃墟と化した都である

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500010_MATOYA<tab>Don't you know it's rude to enter without knocking? Hmph, the youth of today─no manners at all...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500010_MATOYA<tab>(-？？？？-)勝手に人様の住まいに上がり込むだなんて、
まったく、礼儀がなってない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500020_YSHTOLA<tab>Though we neglected to knock, we <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> create something of a commotion. I had hoped that would suffice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500020_YSHTOLA<tab>あら、「ノック」ならしたわよ？
物騒な使い魔たちを叩きのめしてね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500030_MATOYA<tab>Heavy-handed as ever, I see. And still not a hint of grace. Some things never change.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500030_MATOYA<tab>いくつになっても無鉄砲なところは変わらないね。
それに可愛げのないところも。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500040_YSHTOLA<tab>To give credit where credit is due─I learned from the best. It has been too long, Master Matoya.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500040_YSHTOLA<tab>あなたが師匠だったからかしら……
マトーヤ、会いたかったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500050_MATOYA<tab>Indeed it has. It's good to see you again, my girl, and with your fiery spirit unquenched. But look at you─all grown up and womanly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500050_MATOYA<tab>お転婆のシュトラが、ずいぶん立派になったもんだ。
いい顔になったよ、誇ってもいいくらいにね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500060_MATOYA<tab>...The one there in the fancy duds─that's Louisoix's granddaughter, I take it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500060_MATOYA<tab>……後ろの坊主は、ルイゾワの孫だね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ahem. Grandson, begging your pardons. You knew my grandfather, my lady?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500070_ALPHINAUD<tab>祖父をご存じなのですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500080_MATOYA<tab>...Knew him? We were constantly at each other's throats! Like rabid dogs, we were! He was a stubborn bugger, was your grandfather. Never a dull moment when he was around, though, I'll give him that. As for you, boy, I've known you since you were a rosy-cheeked babe at the teat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500080_MATOYA<tab>ルイゾワのジジイとは、よく喧嘩したもんさ。
融通の利かない頑固者だったがね……。
アンタにも、赤ん坊のころ、一度だけ会ったことがあるよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500090_ALPHINAUD<tab>And my sister, too, I gather. May I say what an honor it is to meet you again, my lady.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500090_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうでしたか……
では、「お久しぶりです」ということになりますね、
マトーヤ様。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500100_MATOYA<tab>Spare me the hollow pleasantries, boy. I'll wager my remaining good teeth you didn't come to a forgotten corner of Eorzea to flirt with a wrinkly old woman. Now, out with it─what is it you need of me?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500100_MATOYA<tab>フン、お為ごかしの挨拶はおよし。
こんな辺ぴな場所まで、世捨て人を訪ねて来たんだ。
どうせ、ろくでもない問題を持ち込む気だろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500110_MATOYA<tab>Azys Lla... I never thought I'd hear that name again...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500110_MATOYA<tab>……やれやれ、この歳になって、
再び「魔大陸」の名を聞くことになろうとはね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500120_YSHTOLA<tab>You are familiar with it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500120_YSHTOLA<tab>知っているの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500130_MATOYA<tab>As familiar as one can get from poring over musty old tomes. The Allagans set the isle afloat not long before the sun set on their empire. Old Louisoix and I often talked about it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500130_MATOYA<tab>古の書のなかで、見たことがあるだけさ。
古代アラグ帝国が、その末期に創り上げた人工浮遊大陸……。
ルイゾワとも、よく話したっけね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500140_MATOYA<tab>The place is home to a research facility dedicated to finding ways of mastering mighty beings such as primals and dragons. And find ways it did, too─<var 1A 02 /var>frightening<var 1A 01 /var> ones.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500140_MATOYA<tab>竜や蛮神といった強大な力を持つ存在を征すため、
禁断の技術を編み出した、一種の研究所があった場所らしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500150_MATOYA<tab>Such secrets as lie buried on Azys Lla aren't fit to see the light of day. And now you tell me a band of dragon-baiting primal-botherers are trying to dig them up!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500150_MATOYA<tab>ありとあらゆる、おぞましい知識が集まる禁忌の地。
そんな場所に向かっている愚か者どもがいるとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. And to make matters worse, the Ascians have a hand in their plot. They must be stopped, no matter the cost.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500160_ALPHINAUD<tab>だからこそ、追わねばなりません。
アシエンの存在が確認されている以上、
その目論見を、打ち砕かねばならないのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500170_MATOYA<tab>I see. Very well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500170_MATOYA<tab>……なるほど、事情はわかったよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500180_YSHTOLA<tab>You will help us, then? Truly? I had not anticipated such an impassioned response. Could it be that the presence of young blood has stirred your own?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500180_YSHTOLA<tab>あら、やる気になるなんて、めずらしいわね。
若者の気に当てられたかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500190_MATOYA<tab>Ah, some things never change... One day, that pertness is going to cost you your tail, my girl. Don't say I didn't warn you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_500190_MATOYA<tab>シュトラめ、ちっともお転婆が直っとらん……。
尻尾の一本や二本、失くすくらいが、ちょうどいいのさ。
アンタにはね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600010_MATOYA<tab>'Twas some fifty years ago, shortly after Garlemald had brought all of Ilsabard under its rule.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600010_MATOYA<tab>50年ほど前……
北州イルサバード大陸に帝国が興って、間もないころの話さ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600020_MATOYA<tab>Faced with the threat of invasion, the people of Sharlayan scrambled about for a means to resist the Empire. For my part, I was tasked with developing an aetheric converger.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600020_MATOYA<tab>急速に領土拡大を始めたガレマール帝国に対して、
いくつかの対抗手段が練られることになってね……
そこで、ワシが担当したのが、エーテル収束器だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600030_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah, yes, a device which draws in aether and concentrates it to produce a destructive force.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600030_YSHTOLA<tab>大気に満ちたエーテルを一点に集めて圧縮し、
強大な力を得る秘術ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600040_MATOYA<tab>But as my research neared its end, it was denounced by the Forum, who claimed that my device was more likely to destroy us than our enemies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600040_MATOYA<tab>ところがどうだい……。
研究も大詰めってところで、哲学者議会の連中ときたら、
ワシの研究成果を、大量破壊兵器の開発だと罵りおった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600050_MATOYA<tab>After that, they and I had a little falling-out, and I decided to seal away all the fruits of my research, lest the dunderheaded ingrates reap any benefit. Petty, I know, but gods, it was satisfying!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600050_MATOYA<tab>頭にきたワシは、研究成果を禁書封印してやったのさ。
誰にも読めないよう、誰の手にも入らぬように。
いざ帝国が攻めてきたとき、慌てるがいいさ……とね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600060_YSHTOLA<tab>Do mine ears deceive? 'Twas you, was it not, who was so fond of saying that all knowledge exists to advance mankind? That how it is used depends on us?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600060_YSHTOLA<tab>技術は純粋な学問、どう使うのかは人次第……
マトーヤの口癖だったじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600070_MATOYA<tab>I don't remember. Perhaps. All right, yes, that was a pet phrase of mine. And that should give you a notion of how sick and tired I was of those spineless wretches of the Forum. All talk and no trousers, that lot. That's why I decided to remain behind rather than join the exodus.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600070_MATOYA<tab>フン、元よりあの石頭どもには辟易してたからね。
ここに引っ込むことを決めたのさ。
「大撤収」するなんぞ、奴らの臆病ぶりには反吐が出るわい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600080_ALPHINAUD<tab>You may have had your disagreements with my grandfather, but upon that point, your minds were as one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600080_ALPHINAUD<tab>フフフ……まるで祖父を見ているようです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600090_YSHTOLA<tab>With respect, Master─the fruits of your research should not be left to spoil. Will you share with us the secrets of the aetheric converger?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600090_YSHTOLA<tab>それで、マトーヤ。
その研究成果の封印を解いて、私たちに見せてくれるのよね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600100_MATOYA<tab>Aye, I will. All the information you need is contained in a tome I wrote on the subject. But you'll have to fetch it from the forbidden section of the Great Library.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600100_MATOYA<tab>シャーレアンが誇る知識の殿堂、「グブラ幻想図書館」……。
その最深部の禁書庫に、眠っているよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600110_YSHTOLA<tab>You were not exaggerating when you said that you had sealed it away. Though the city is abandoned, the library's guardians are all but certain to remain. We must needs cut a path through them. Come─let us away.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600110_YSHTOLA<tab>あきれるほど厳重ね……まあいいわ。
守護兵がいるのでしょうけど、私たちの腕なら問題ないはず。
さあ、行きましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600120_MATOYA<tab>Not so fast! You don't expect that you can just waltz on in, now, do you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600120_MATOYA<tab>待ちな……！
あの場所に入るために必要なものがあるのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600130_MATOYA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_600130_MATOYA<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_610010_ALPHINAUD<tab>So this is the tome. Excellent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_610010_ALPHINAUD<tab>無事に論文を確保できたようだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_610020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us take it to Master Matoya at once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_610020_ALPHINAUD<tab>さあ、マトーヤ様のところに戻ろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700010_MATOYA<tab>I had not thought to behold this tome again...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700010_MATOYA<tab>もう一度、この論文を目にすることができるとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700020_MATOYA<tab>There. It is deciphered. Now your friend should be able to make sense of the contents.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700020_MATOYA<tab>研究内容を悪用されないように、細工を施してあるからね。
ちょいと暗号化魔法を解いてやれば、
そのシドとかいう機工師でも、読めるようになるはずだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700030_MATOYA<tab>That said, it's one thing to understand the workings of the aetheric converger, and another to actually make it work. You do realize how much aether is required?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700030_MATOYA<tab>ただし、理論は解ったとしても、
エーテルの槍を形成するために必要な莫大なエーテルを、
どうやって用立てるつもりだい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Cid is keenly aware of the energy dilemma. His airship is by no means large, and it can only bear a limited quantity of crystals.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700040_ALPHINAUD<tab>その点に関しては、シドも心配していました。
クリスタルを積み込むにしても、
飛空艇の積載量には、どうしても限界があると。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700050_YSHTOLA<tab>If only we had white auracite and the aetheric siphon...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700050_YSHTOLA<tab>白聖石と、エーテル・エクストラクターなら、
解決できるかもしれないけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alas, Minfilia is missing, along with both artifacts. And Moenbryda is gone...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700060_ALPHINAUD<tab>現物を持っているであろうミンフィリアは、未だに行方不明……。
ムーンブリダも、今はもう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700070_YSHTOLA<tab>Would that there were another ready wellspring of energy for us to draw upon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700070_YSHTOLA<tab>……膨大なエーテル……魔力の源……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Why did it not occur to us before?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700080_ALPHINAUD<tab>……魔力の源だって！？
そうだ、あるじゃないか、取っておきの代物が！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700090_ALPHINAUD<tab>We already have what we need: the Eye!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700090_ALPHINAUD<tab>「竜の眼」だよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700100_ALPHINAUD<tab>It has been drawing aether into itself for as long as the great wyrms have lived! It is a veritable wellspring of energy!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700100_ALPHINAUD<tab>万年の時を生きる「七大天竜」が、
悠久の時の中でエーテルを溜め込んできた、
文字どおりの、魔力の源だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700110_MATOYA<tab>Hm, it might just suit our needs. But is this energy something that can be harnessed at will?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700110_MATOYA<tab>ふむ、確かに理論上は可能ではあるね。
自在に「竜の眼」からエーテルを引き出せれば……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700120_ALPHINAUD<tab>I believe so─with the aid of the Azure Dragoon of Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700120_ALPHINAUD<tab>「眼」とともにあったイシュガルドの「蒼の竜騎士」ならば、
それも可能でありましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700130_YSHTOLA<tab>Then it is settled. Let us return to the Holy See at once.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700130_YSHTOLA<tab>どうやら、光明が見えてきたようね。
さっそくイシュガルドに戻りましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700140_MATOYA<tab>Shtola, wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700140_MATOYA<tab>……シュトラ、お待ち。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700150_MATOYA<tab>When did the light fade from your eyes?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700150_MATOYA<tab>お前、目が見えてないね。
……いつからだい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700160_YSHTOLA<tab>I might have known that it would not escape your notice. It has been this way since I returned from the Lifestream. An aftereffect of the teleportation magick I invoked, most like.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700160_YSHTOLA<tab>あら、気付いていたのね……。
きっと「エンシェント・テレポ」の後遺症だわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700170_MATOYA<tab>They are called “forbidden spells” for a reason. What were you thinking, girl?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700170_MATOYA<tab>……馬鹿な子だよ。
どんな理由があったかはしらないが、
禁術に手を出すだなんて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700180_YSHTOLA<tab>I have no regrets. I but did what was necessary to preserve the light of hope─to keep my promise to Minfilia.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700180_YSHTOLA<tab>ミンフィリアとの約束だから。
悪しき者から、あの人を……光の芽を守るため……。
私にできることをやっただけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700190_YSHTOLA<tab>Besides, it afforded me the rare opportunity to wander the aether─a once-in-a-lifetime experience.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700190_YSHTOLA<tab>それに、地脈を彷徨うなんて、
貴重な体験をすることができたんだもの。
むしろ、ありがたいくらいよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700200_MATOYA<tab>I need not tell you that it consumes your very life force to see by sensing the aether around you. Take care of yourself, do you hear me?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700200_MATOYA<tab>エーテルの流れだけで辺りを視ることは、
魔力を消耗させ、体に大きな負担となる……。
重々、気を付けなさい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700210_YSHTOLA<tab>I will, Master Matoya. And thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_700210_YSHTOLA<tab>……ありがとう、マトーヤ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800010_YSHTOLA<tab>Until but recently, the Ishgardians had kept their doors firmly shut to outsiders.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800010_YSHTOLA<tab>不思議なものね……。
少し前までは、異邦人がイシュガルドに入ることは、
そう簡単なことではなかったわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800020_YSHTOLA<tab>But thanks to you, we have found in them stout allies, with whom we may fight to secure the future of the realm. Truly, you are the beacon of hope towards which all men are drawn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800020_YSHTOLA<tab>それが今や、こうして手に手を取って、
私たちは同じ目的のために戦おうとしている……。
やはりあなたは、人々にとって希望の灯火なのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800030_ESTINIEN<tab>Spare us the hyperbole. 'Tis not for praise that we fight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800030_ESTINIEN<tab>やめておけ……こいつも、俺も、
そんな言葉のために戦っているわけじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800040_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh? In light of all we have achieved, I felt it only meet to express my gratitude.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800040_YSHTOLA<tab>あら……？
お礼くらいは、言わせてもらってもいいんじゃない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800050_ESTINIEN<tab>All that we have achieved? Hmph. Spoken like a true outsider. Until the war is over, we have achieved nothing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800050_ESTINIEN<tab>フン、呑気なものだ……。
俺たちイシュガルドの民にとって、
この先の戦いは、千年の因果を断ち切る戦いだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800060_ESTINIEN<tab>The coming battle is a chance to excise the root of this conflict, and by my hand, it shall be done. <var 1A 02 /var>Then<var 1A 01 /var> you may speak of achievement.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800060_ESTINIEN<tab>「魔大陸」……。
かの地で俺は、この手で、すべてにケリをつける。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800070_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twas not mine intent to make light of your struggle. If I have given offense, then I apologize. But if I may speak freely, you would do well to be wary of the Eye. Even now, it burns with insatiable hatred, watching unblinking for a sign of weakness. Should you falter for so much as a moment, it will surely consume you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800070_YSHTOLA<tab>あなたの思想や意思を否定するつもりはないわ。
でも、気を付けることね……その「眼」は隙を窺っている……。
その眼の奥には、未だ憎しみの炎が見えるもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800080_ESTINIEN<tab>Save your concern. I will consume the Eye ere I let it consume me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800080_ESTINIEN<tab>世迷言を……。
もしそうであったとしても、その炎ごと俺が食らい、
消し去ってやるさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800090_URIANGER<tab>Twelve be praised, thou hast not yet set forth!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800090_URIANGER<tab>あぁ、間に合ったようですね……。
あなたに渡したい物があり、砂の荒野より、
はるばる山の都へと届けに来たのです……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800100_URIANGER<tab>'Cross sand and snow have I journeyed, that I might deliver this gift unto thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800100_URIANGER<tab>これを……あなたに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800110_YSHTOLA<tab>White auracite... But whence did it come?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800110_YSHTOLA<tab>それは、白聖石？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800120_URIANGER<tab>To mine amazement, it lay hid amongst Moenbryda's last effects. 'Twas but blind chance, or providence, that I did hap to spy it. Let no man claim that my late friend e'er erred for lack of foresight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800120_URIANGER<tab>石の家の一角に隠された、ムーンブリダの私物より、
この石を発見しました。
……聡い彼女のこと、予備を遺していたのでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800130_URIANGER<tab>In the place whither thou goest, servants of Darkness do lie in wait. Pray give unto me thy pledge that thou wilt strike them down and avenge our fallen comrade.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03006_800130_URIANGER<tab>あなたが向かう地には、我が愛しき人の命を奪いし、
混沌の使者アシエンがいる……
どうか、あなたの手で、奴らを……。
